mapper.insert: insert into t_litter_image(content_type, url, predicted_label, feedback_label, huge_type) values(#{litterImage.contentType}, #{litterImage.url}, #{litterImage.predictedLabel}, #{litterImage.feedbackLabel}, #{litterImage.hugeType})
mapper.update:
update t_litter_image
content_type=#{litterImage.contentType},
url=#{litterImage.url},
predicted_label = #{litterImage.predictedLabel},
feedback_label = #{litterImage.feedbackLabel},
huge_type = #{litterImage.hugeType},
where id=#{litterImage.id}
mapper.select: select id, content_type, url, predicted_label, feedback_label, upload_time, huge_type from t_litter_image

select id, content_type, url, predicted_label, feedback_label, upload_time, huge_type from t_litter_image where (predicted_label is null) or (predicted_label = feedback_label) or (upload_time < DATE_SUB(NOW(), interval #{hourCount} hour) and feedback_label is null);
